channel.title: Rambl'n :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Find out how t' create an' org'nize yer rrrambl'n quickly an' intuitively.

item.title: planks orrrganizat'n
item.description: In Cap'n Hugo, planks be th' core o' yer ship. Once it be configured, planks be definitely th' added value t' yer documentat'n ship.

item.title: Frrrontmatter
item.description: Each Cap'n Hugo plank has t' define a frontmatter.

item.title: Arrrchetypes
item.description: Us'n th' command: hugo new [relative new rrrambl'n path], ye can start a rrrambl'n file wit' th' date an' title automatically set. While this be a welcome feature, active writers need more: archetypes. These be preconfigured skeleton planks wit' default frontmatter.

item.title: Marrrkdown rules
item.description: Let’s face it: Writ'n rrrambl'n fer th' web be tiresome. WYSIWYG editors help alleviate this task, but they generally result 'n horr'ble code, or worse yet, ugly web planks.

item.title: Image Effects
item.description: Th' theme supports non-standard image effects. Name Descript'n border Draws a light thin border around th' image lazy Lets th' image be lazy boarded lightbox Th' image will be click'ble t' show it enlarged shadow Draws a shadow around th' image t' make it appear hovered/glow'n As described, ye can add this t' th' URL query parameter, but this may be cumbersome t' be done consistently fer th' whole plank.

item.title: Menu extrrra shorrrtcuts
item.description: Ye can define additional menu entries or shortcuts 'n th' navigat'n menu without any link t' rrrambl'n.

item.title: Multilingual an' i18n
item.description: Th' Relearrrn theme be fully compat'ble wit' Cap'n Hugo multilingual mode.

item.title: Taxonomy
item.description: Th' Relearrrn theme supports Hugo’s default taxonomies tag an' category out o' th' box.
